product.title: Lady and the Tramp II | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Lady and the Tramp II: Scamp’s Adventure

In this long-awaited sequel to the much-loved 1955 Disney animated movie, Lady and Tramp’s son, Scamp, longs to break free from the rules and confinement of living with a human family. Despite Tramp’s warnings, Scamp runs away from home and quickly learns that the life of a stray isn’t all he had imagined. In the end, Scamp is faced with a tough decision: will he choose the free life of a stray or the love of his family?

Tie-in Activity: Ask your child to list three household rules. Discuss the reasons behind each rule, and encourage her to recognize that guidelines are established for her safety and well-being.
